name: Isolation Station Annihilation
description:
Heyo!

This is the second game for my "one game per month" project! This was a big one, I hope you enjoy it (warning: it was big, but this is not a long game).

You can support that endeavour here: https://www.patreon.com/stuffedwombat

Special thanks to Britt Brady for making the sound effects! Follow him on twitter & buy his games pls: https://twitter.com/Britt_t_Brady

If you want to stay updated on the next games, follow me on NG or twitter: https://twitter.com/wombatstuff
